channel.title: Problem modding sound files
channel.description:
I've been trying to modify some of the EP2 songs (which something I've done succesfully in the past). Now the problem is that, when the music is supposed to play (for example, the last stand on the mine shaft) I just get nothing. Not even the default music comes up. Also, when I first modded the ep2 music, I got it right, and did the same thing now, except now it simply doesn't work.
So I ask you, what could've gone wrong?
Note: I already checked and double checked the files names and their mp3 information. I obviously changed that as well to match the original music files info.
EDIT: Nevermind, I finally corrected the issue. I had to re-compress the sound files so they got a 44000khz frequency, otherwise HL2 wouldn't accept them.

Double check the file name and the folder structure. At least for Original Half-life the game kept overwriting the music file.
